issues_without_maintainer_response.title: Publish on the JSR
stderr is not available until after start is called
consider defaulting resetTimeoutOnProgress to True
Add ways for server processes to self-terminate when host is gone
/token endpoint should validate redirect_uri matches
Bug: npm spawn processes incorrectly use root directory instead of project directory
Allow Custom Client Features for MCP Tools
Allow receiving messages per stream in client sdk
Streamable HTTP examples use incorrect status code for invalid session IDs
InvalidParams error when all fields in the tool schema are optional
Client class should throw a custom exception if the capability is unsupported
Subclassing McpServer causes tool invocation issues
Bug Report: Tool Handlers Not Invoked with StdioServerTransport on macOS
tool/call results in 'Method not found' with StreamableHTTPServerTransport in stateful session after successful initialize (SDK v1.12.0)
Support the resources/subscribe method
Invalid JSON RPC requests do not respond with an error
Auth : Allow user provided routes to escape Auth middleware
StdioClientTransport does not follow the spec on close
Enforcing Content-Type header on client requests
Request handlers not cancelled when transport connection closes unexpectedly
Support Zod schema with Elicitation?
Please add the ability to supply the the registerClient and defaultScopes to the ProxyOAuthServerProvider
OAuth Request Should Accept client_id and client_secret via Headers, Not Just in the Request Body
Need an example to implement dynamic client registration against an existing oauth server
Bug: StreamableHTTPClientTransport Fails to Reconnect on Non-Resumable Streams
Can we have a chatbot example that connected to multiple remote servers
Feature: Retrieve info about registered Resources and execute them from a tool
ProxyOAuthServerProvider fails with Zod validation error when using Ory Hydra as OAuth provider
OAuth token exchange fails with URL-encoded responses - assumes JSON format only
MCP Python SDK sessionId not maintained in browser with TypeScript SDK client
Memory leak in StreamableHTTP and SSE
invoke asyn method in mcp tool through StreamableHttpTransport cause early return from tool call
Cannot destructure property 'requestInfo' of 'undefined' as it is undefined.
Package attaches process signal handlers
StreamableHTTPClientTransport is not implementing Transport properly
Issue: No Reliable Mapping Between sessionId and streamId for Stateless Resumability
McpServer re-registers capabilities after connect, blocking dynamic registration even when capabilities were supplied at construction
Avoid trying SSE connection in `StreamableHTTPClientTransport`
OAuth: scope parameter missing from token exchange requests
Prefer token endpoint auth method obtained during OAuth client registration
Bug Report: Initialize Request Cancellation Violation
Bug Report-2: Missing Periodic Ping Implementation
Simplify public access to McpServer registered tools
Support upscoping on insufficient_scope 403 like in Python SDK

Call schema on inputSchema validation failure
Zombie Task Collision in StreamableHTTPServerTransport

Feature Request: Middleware support for McpServer
Bug: `server.tool()` silently ignores ZodObject schemas and strips all arguments
Support RFC 8252 dynamic loopback port selection for native OAuth clients
Auth Failure Retry Handler `_hasCompletedAuthFlow`
OAuth token exchange doesn't handle error responses returned as HTTP 200
Need  to override json limit defaults for express body parser in createMcpExpressApp()
Add Typebox support

qs's arrayLimit bypass in its bracket notation allows DoS via memory exhaustion
v1.25.0 pollutes/replaces global.fetch
Bug: `new McpServer()` throws "Schema method literal must be a string" during initialization (method literal stored under `_def.values[0]`)
Task-augmented tool call errors are wrapped incorrectly, masking actual error messages
Some transport errors are silently swallowed due to missing `onerror` callback usage
